(i) Under the provisions of this Section 3.2(b), on a Facility-by-Facility basis, if the estimated Facility Conversion Costs for a given Facility during any Fiscal Year following the first full Fiscal Year of the Term of the applicable Facility Addendum (hereinafter referred to as a "Facility Conversion Cost Adjustment Fiscal Year") deviate significantly from the Facility Conversion Cost Baseline Fiscal Year costs, then the Price for the relevant Product may be subject to adjustment. 17. Miscellaneous Matters:

In the event of any disagreement concerning this Agreement, the Parties shall endeavor to resolve such dispute in good faith through negotiations. If a resolution cannot be reached within sixty (60) days following the commencement of such negotiations, either Party may seek a resolution through binding arbitration, with the cost of arbitration equally split between the Parties. The decision of the arbitrator shall be final and binding upon both Parties, and neither Party shall have the right to challenge or appeal the arbitrator's decision in any court.

Such notice shall specify the nature of the dispute and set forth the facts upon which the disputing Party relies. Upon receipt of such notice, the other Party shall have thirty (30) days to respond in writing with a good faith attempt to resolve the matter through negotiations. If, after such time, no agreement has been reached, either Party may proceed with arbitration as provided above.

This clause shall supersede any prior agreements regarding dispute resolution between the Parties and represents the complete understanding of the Parties on this topic. However, nothing in this clause shall prevent either Party from seeking injunctive or other equitable relief in connection with a breach or threatened breach of this Agreement.
